data.title: 200 Greatest Science Fiction Books
data.meta_description: List of 200 Greatest Science Fiction Books including it's sub-genres, series, and it's broad perspective of definition.
data.text:
1. Stranger in a Strange Land - by Robert A Heinlein

2. Dune - by Frank Herbert

3. Foundation - by Isaac Asimov

4. Fahrenheit 451 - by Ray Bradbury

5. The Book of the New Sun - by Gene Wolfe

6. 1984 - by George Orwell

7. Brave New World - by Aldous Huxley

8. Earth Abides - by George R Stewart

9. The Book of the Long Sun - by Gene Wolfe

10. Childhood's End - by Arthur C Clarke

11. The Dispossessed - by Ursula K. LeGuin

12. The Demolished Man - by Alfred Bester

13. Flatland - by Edwin A Abbott

14. The Moon Is A Harsh Mistress - by Robert A Heinlein

15. The Left Hand of Darkness - by Ursula K. LeGuin

16. Frankenstein - by Mary Shelley

17. Slaughterhouse-Five - by Kurt Vonnegut

18. Ender's Game - by Orson Scott Card

19. I Am Legend - by Richard Matheson

20. The Time Machine - by H.G. Wells

21. All My Sins Remembered - by Joe Haldeman

22. The War of the Worlds - by H.G. Wells

23. Cat's Cradle - by Kurt Vonnegut

24. The City and The Stars - by Arthur C Clarke

25. Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep? - by Philip K Dick

40. Limbo - by Bernard Wolfe

41. The Invisible Man - by H.G. Wells

42. The Fifth Head of Cerebus - by Gene Wolfe

43. The Puppet Masters - by Robert A Heinlein

44. Last and First Men - by Olaf Stapledon

45. Alastor - by Jack Vance

46. A Wrinkle in Time - by Madeleine L'Engle

48. Island - by Aldous Huxley

49. The Forever War - by Joe Haldeman
